entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 a.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 4. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
